title: Spread Volumes Indicator
content:
This indicator is designed to visualize the volume traded at bid and ask prices over time, providing insights into market activity. It displays colored rectangles representing bid and ask volume at different price levels.

To add and set up the indicator, open the Indicators settings window.


Indicator's settings

Colors

NameDescription
Buy Color Sets the color of the element representing the buy signal.
Sell Color Sets the color of the element representing the sell signal.
Text Color Sets the color of the label text.

Common

NameDescription
Spacing Defines the size of the distance between labels.
Offset Sets the x-axis offset of the label in pixels.
Width Defines the width of the label.
